means: （表示不在乎，什么都可接受）什么都可以

sentence.Network_en: I was allowed to do whatever I wanted with my life.

sentence.Network_en: Whatever you want to chat about, we'll do it tonight.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你想聊些什么，我们今晚聊个够。

sentence.Network_en: Whatever its obscurities, the poem was clear on at least one count.
sentence.Network_cn: 这首诗再怎么晦涩，至少有一点是清楚的。

encyclopedia.content: 专辑 二缺一 专辑名称：二缺一 歌手：蔡卓妍 发行日期：2009年4月6日 语言：粤语 重量锛埩帮級: 200 (g) 出品商：英皇娱乐集团（HK）专辑资料 Twins暂时分道扬镳，蔡卓妍以《二缺一》身份带来首张个人大碟，同名主打情歌由周博贤一手包办曲词，曲名和歌词也看似阿Sa凭歌寄意赠好拍档阿娇。此外，主打之作「二缺一」和两首接力情歌「I'm Sorry」和「氢气球」也找来影帝张家辉和师弟陈伟霆(William)担当MV男主角，随碟附送四首

entry.tran: 任何…的事物;凡是…的东西
entry.def: You use whatever to refer to anything or everything of a particular type.

example.ex: Franklin was free to do pretty much whatever he pleased...
example.tran: 富兰克林几乎可以做自己喜欢做的任何事情。

example.ex: When you're older I think you're better equipped mentally to cope with whatever happens...
example.tran: 你年龄再大一些后，我想你就会有更强的心理承受能力来面对所发生的任何事。

entry.def: You use whatever to say that something is the case in all circumstances.

example.ex: We shall love you whatever happens, Diana...
example.tran: 戴安娜，不管发生什么，我们都爱你。

example.ex: People will judge you whatever you do...
example.tran: 不论你做什么，人们都会品头论足。

entry.tran: (用于名词词组后，强调否定陈述)任何，丝毫
entry.def: You use whatever after a noun group in order to emphasize a negative statement.

example.ex: There is no evidence whatever that competition in broadcasting has ever reduced costs...
example.tran: 没有任何证据表明，广播业的竞争使成本有所降低。

example.ex: I have nothing whatever to say.

entry.def: You use whatever to ask in an emphatic way about something which you are very surprised about.

example.ex: Whatever is the matter with you both?

entry.tran: (用于表示不清楚刚才所提到事物的准确特征、含义、价值等)不管什么，随便怎样
entry.def: You use whatever when you are indicating that you do not know the precise identity, meaning, or value of the thing just mentioned.

example.ex: I thought that my upbringing was 'normal', whatever that is...
example.tran: 我认为我的成长过程甭管怎么说还算“正常”。

example.ex: 'I love you,' he said. — 'Whatever that means,' she said.
example.tran: 他说：“我爱你。”—— 她说：“你懂什么是爱吗？”

entry.def: You say or whatever to refer generally to something else of the same kind as the thing or things that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: You may like a Malt whisky that is peatier, or smokier, or sweeter, or whatever.
example.tran: 你可能想来一杯麦芽威士忌，炭香味重些的、烟熏味重些的或者更甘甜些的，或者什么别的口味的。

entry.tran: (表示勉强接受)随便你怎么说
entry.def: You say 'whatever you say' to indicate that you accept what someone has said, even though you do not really believe them or do not think it is a good idea.

example.ex: 'We'll go in your car, Billy.'—'Whatever you say.'

entry.tran: (用于提出建议或警告)不管做什么，无论怎样
entry.def: You say whatever you do when giving advice or warning someone about something.

example.ex: Whatever you do, don't look for a pay increase when you know the company is going through some difficulty...
example.tran: 不管怎样，在知道公司遭遇困境时不要指望加薪。

example.ex: Whatever you do, don't upset the women.
example.tran: 不管你做什么，不要让女士们感到不安。

means.word_mean: 1. one or some or every or all without specification;

sentences.sentence: "give me any peaches you don't want"
"cars can be rented at almost any airport"
"give me whatever peaches you don't want"

Sentence.sentence: Mr Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions (排放), though necessary, will be far from cost-free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
So just type in the destination you want, sit back, sleep, watch your movie, whatever.
I suspect that whatever Facebook has done so far to invade our privacy, it's only the beginning
They will serve as modem Magellans, mapping out the solar system for whatever explorers follow, whether man or machine.
Just make use of whatever information is available.

That notion is not concrete enough and it blurs two key components of hope,' Doctor Snyder said, 'Having hope means believing you have both the will and the way to accomplish your goals, whatever they may be.

means.word_mean: 任何(事物), 每样(事物)

sentences.en: I will do whatever you wish.

means.word_mean: 无论什么, 不管什么

sentences.en: We will never give up working, whatever happens.
sentences.cn: 无论发生什么事, 我们都不会放弃工作。

jushi.chinese: 抽烟总是有害的,不管你抽什么样的烟。

jushi.english: I will do whatever you wish.
